description:
My place is a Unique Large private Cozy Convertible Studio/1 Bedroom in a 
Modern Art Deco Building located on the Subterranean Level with access to Small Outdoor Area. 

Walking Distance to Tompkins Square Park, 
Mass Transit (L Train), CitiBike Station, 
Trendy Restaurants & Bars. 
 
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

This space has private entrance,private restroom,totally independent...

The kitchen area is not adapted for cooking...{look at the picture}
name: Private entire floor/in duplex apartment...
review: Leo est un hôte  sympa et arrangeant. Appartement très  calme, propre et dans un quartier animé et proche des lieux à visiter ! Logement à recommander !
